content:
Hi @Grahame Grieve is there a way to turn off sending of usage stats? It seems to slow down my build by minutes.
If you look at the log file, it looks like its spending about 3 minutes trying to send usage stats before moving to Jekyll site generation.
ig-publisher.log

Thank you!

The TOC is normally limited to only 2 levels of content, so that helps some. The presumption is also that labels will be relatively short. Splitting the screen is a possibility, but not a simple change to make

@Lloyd McKenzie I'm confused...was this meant for another thread?
or limit to 3 secs before moving on?
